mapper.sql: s.id, s.companyId, s.sourceName, s.account, s.pwd, s.link, s.status, s.discount, s.templateId,s.manageControlId, s.deleted, st.name,mcs.rmModleName
mapper.insert: insert into source (companyId, sourceName,account, pwd, link, discount, templateid,managecontrolid) values (#{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sourcename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateid,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{managecontrolid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into source
id,
companyId,
sourceName,
account,
pwd,
link,
status,
discount,
remarks,
deleted,

mapper.update:
update source
companyId = #{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sourceName = #{sourcename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
discount = #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update source set companyId = #{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sourceName = #{sourcename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, templateid = #{templateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, managecontrolid = #{managecontrolid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from source s left join source_template st on s.templateId=st.id left join manage_control_settings mcs on s.manageControlId=mcs.id where s.companyId=#{arg0} and s.deleted=0
mapper.update: update source set deleted=1 where id=#{arg0}
mapper.select: select count(sourceName) from source where sourceName=#{arg0}
mapper.update: update source set companyId = #{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sourceName = #{sourcename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, templateid = #{templateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, managecontrolid = #{managecontrolid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted = 0 where sourcename = #{sourcename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t.sourceid,count(*) registernum,t.companyid,t.sourcename from (select u.sourceid,s.sourcename,u.phone,u.registeTime,u.companyid from user u left join source s on u.sourceId=s.id where u.companyid=#{arg0} and u.registeTime>=#{arg1} and u.registeTime <#{arg2}) t group by t.sourceid
select discount from source where id=#{arg0} and companyId=#{arg1}
select id from source where sourcename = #{sourceId}
select registeTime from user u,source s where u.sourceId=s.id and u.companyId=#{arg0} and s.sourceName=#{arg1}
select count(u.id) from user u where u.companyId=#{arg0} and u.sourceid=#{arg1} and u.registeTime>=#{arg2} and u.registeTime <#{arg3}
select discount from source where id=#{arg0}
select count(*) from user u where u.sourceid=#{arg0} and u.loginStatus=1 and u.registeTime>=#{arg1} and u.registeTime <#{arg2}
select u.id from user u where u.sourceid=#{arg0}
select count(*) from user_attestation uat inner join user u on uat.userid=u.id where u.id=#{arg0} and uat.authentime>=#{arg1} and uat.authentime <#{arg2}
select count(*) from bankcard b inner join user u on b.userid=u.id where u.id=#{arg0} and b.authentime>=#{arg1} and b.authentime <#{arg2}
select count(*) from operator op inner join user u on op.userid=u.id where u.id=#{arg0} and op.authentime>=#{arg1} and op.authentime <#{arg2}
select airappFractionalSegment from manage_control_settings mcs inner join source s on mcs.id=s.manageControlId where s.sourceName=#{arg0}
select registetime from user where companyId=#{arg0}
select manageControlId from source where sourceName =#{sourceName}
select count(*) from user where sourceid=#{arg0} and (shareOfState=2 or shareOfState=4) and registeTime>=#{arg1} and registeTime <#{arg2}
select count(DISTINCT o.userid) from orders o inner join user u on o.userid=u.id where u.sourceid=#{arg0} and u.registeTime>=#{arg1} and u.registeTime <#{arg2}
select count(*) from user where companyId=#{arg0} and sourceId=#{arg1} and applytime>=#{arg2} and applytime <#{arg3}
select status from source where companyId=#{companyId} and sourceName = #{sourceName}
select deleted from source where companyId=#{companyId} and sourceName = #{sourceName}
select id from source where companyId=#{companyId} and sourceName = #{source}
select sourceName from source where id = #{sourceId}
select count(*) from source where link = #{arg0} and deleted=0
select * from source where account=#{arg0} and status=1 and deleted=0
